author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Tamil Nadu State Legal Services Authority (TNSLA) on Saturday settled over 13 thousand cases valued about Rs. 115.76 crore through a State-level Lok Adalat.

The adalats were organised in view of a national-level Lok Adalat call issued by the National Legal Services Authority. According to a press statement, over one lakh cases were taken up for hearing, out of which 13, 937 were settled by Saturday evening.
title: Cases valued at Rs. 115 crore settled through Lok Adalat
